handleUserTokenTransfers(address,address.details: This function will be called when either user is transferring the tokens to other account, or is receiving tokens from other tokens.

params.amount: the amount that is being transferred
params.tokenId: the id of the token that is being transferred

params.index: index of the contract to remove from the list

setOwner(address).details: This function takes in the address of new owner and sets it to the contract

params.owner: Takes the address of new owner as parameter

addVotingContract(address).notice: @dev This function is to add a voting contract, the added contract will be notified when a token transfer occurs

removeVotingContract(uint256).notice: @dev This function removes address from voting contract array

setOwner(address).notice: This function is to set the owner address

setTreasuryCoreContractAddress(address).notice: @dev This function sets the treasury Contract address
